name: Amelia ground pound adventure
description:
This is a small game about Amelia to ground pound other HoloEn members.
It may takes a bit of time to load this game.
This game may have glitches that stuck Ame under the ground.
If you love this game please go to support Amelia's channel and Walfie.

Bug fixed:

  • Fixed jumping Ina bug.

How to play:

  • Ground Pound as much members as you can.  Ame will be teleported if she get trapped or rushed into other members without ground pounding.

Control:

  • Movement: Amelia will auto roll forward.  
  • Jump:  Press  Space.
  • Double jump: Press Space while jumping.
  • Ground Pound: Press  X after double jumped.

操作方法:

  • 移動：　自動で前進する。
  • ジャンプ：　スペースキー
  • 二度ジャンプ：　ジャンプする時　スペースキー
  • グラウンドポンド：二度ジャンプする時　Xキー

Credits:

All character artworks are drawn by Walfie .
Walfie : https://twitter.com/walfieee
Amelia Watson: Watson Amelia Ch. hololive-EN
BGM used: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kKg-aXVS1YI
ホロライブプロダクション: https://twitter.com/hololivetv
